cs.NE, cs.ET, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV. 

The paper discusses the implementation of neuromorphic chips for learning and memory using attractor dynamics in recurrent networks. This falls under the category of neural networks and learning (cs.NE). The paper also mentions the use of on-chip synaptic plasticity, which is related to electronic devices and circuits (cs.ET). Additionally, the paper discusses the development of associative memory, which is a topic in machine learning (cs.LG and cs.AI). Finally, the paper focuses on learning from visual stimuli, which is a subfield of computer vision (cs.CV).
